quote: Many answers to what you seek don't lie 'out there'. If you look inwards, you'll find the answer has been in you all along. – Celestine Chua
fact: The first episode of "Joanie Loves Chachi" was the highest rated American program in the history of Korean television, a country where "Chachi" translates to "penis".
joke: Why don’t skeletons ever go trick or treating? Because they have nobody to go with.
